name: You'd better run
description:
Hi ^_^

You'd better run is a runner made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The theme was "Out of Control".

Your goal is to dodge the birds by jumping or crouching, but be careful: the controls are reversed at every change of atmosphere!

Team

-> Asakha : character and birds design

-> Asue : game developer

Credits

-> Background images : Eder Muniz

-> Musics : Ross Bugden (Skies & Reverie)
